name: GSPI Plugin Library
short_description: GSPI_Plugin is intended to provide low-profile support for run-time loading of dynamic libraries and shared objects.  It runs on Windows and Posix, has both C and C++ interfaces, is contained in a single header file, and is licensed primarily under the WTFPL, with a small portion licensed under the Boost Software License.
summary: A simple dynamic library wrapper in C/C++ for Windows/Posix platforms
